channel.title: The Cult Revamp: My Ideas
channel.description:
1. Stalker - Cult Investigative Night Ability 1: Poke Around - Look around your target's room(not really) to learn the class type of your target - 2 uses
2. Fanatic - Cult Offensive Night Ability 1: Persuade - Attempt to persuade, through non-brainwash-y methods, your target to join the cult, they don't join(RIP), but your efforts keep them occupied - 2 uses
3. Telepath - Cult Social Day Ability 1: Dark Whisper - Speak to the Cultists in private during the day time, they cannot speak, only listen - infinite use
4. Shadowguard - Cult Support Night Ability 1: Menacing Presence - Guard a Cult member, making them immune to everything except death that night
5. Psychopath - Cult Killer Night Ability 1: Appeasement - Kill your target and yourself to appease the Blood God
All Classes have the Dark Words and Promotion passives

item.title: The Cult Revamp: My Ideas
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
Guess I’ll put it back then

Read full topic

item.title: The Cult Revamp: My Ideas
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
To clarify, you were close

Offensive and Killer will continue to be separate.

It’s actually DEFENSIVE and SUPPORT that merged into support - the Wiki should be updated already to reflect this.

Read full topic

item.title: The Cult Revamp: My Ideas
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
Okay I’ll remove it then

item.title: The Cult Revamp: My Ideas
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
FadeBlade:

I think they said something about killer types becoming offensive since the only killer they can convert is the knight.

I thought I saw that too but the wiki pages has Offensive And Killer in separate sections

Read full topic

item.title: The Cult Revamp: My Ideas
item.dc:creator: SoulShard
item.description:
I would also suggest giving the cult leader the power to pick who dies. if a cult member is sus and they are nearly killed at day this would mean they die while killing someone

item.title: The Cult Revamp: My Ideas
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
1. Stalker - Cult Investigative
    Night Ability 1: Poke Around - Look around your target’s room(not really) to learn the class type of your target - 2 uses

  2. Fanatic - Cult Offensive
    Night Ability 1: Persuade - Attempt to persuade, through non-brainwash-y methods, your target to join the cult, they don’t join(RIP), but your efforts keep them occupied - 2 uses

  3. Telepath - Cult Social
    Day Ability 1: Dark Whisper - Speak to the Cultists in private during the day time, they cannot speak, only listen - infinite use

  4. Shadowguard - Cult Support
    Night Ability 1: Menacing Presence - Guard a Cult member, making them immune to everything except death that night

  5. Psychopath - Cult Killer
    Night Ability 1: Appeasement - Kill your target and yourself to appease the Blood God

All Classes have the Dark Words and Promotion passives

Read full topic
